summary: This is a brief internal email or notification sent on July 28, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It states that Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation. The document is part of the SDNY case files and is dated just over two weeks before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the notification; inmate #76318-054 who is being taken off of Psych Observation.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal notification states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 28, 2019, which is 16 days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It records the decision to take Jeffrey Epstein off of 'Psych Observation' status.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
